title: How Many Calories in Pepperoni Pizza?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in pepperoni pizza, including full nutrition breakdown per serving, macros, and variations for different crusts and toppings.
h1: How Many Calories in Pepperoni Pizza?
assumptions: Medium 12-inch pepperoni pizza with 8 slices; hand-tossed crust, standard tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, crust type, toppings quantity, and baking method. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium pepperoni pizza has about 1920 kcal, with high carbs from crust and protein from cheese and meat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant pizzas.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 240 kcal per slice for a medium 8-slice pizza.

faqs.q: What are the macros in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Per medium pizza: 216 g carbs, 80 g protein, 84 g fat.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 4080 mg per medium pizza, mostly from cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~40 vs. thick; stuffed crust adds ~300 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in large vs. medium pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: A large (14-inch) has ~50% more, around 2880 kcal total.
